channel.title: Flashlight visibility
channel.description: My flashlight has no use in dark places, especially in the ventilation shafts. So I was blind during some parts of the game. Flashlight's light however shows on some models like handrails or some types of floor...

item.title: Flashlight visibility
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Known bug, covered in the sticky FAQ thread. You have GeForce 7xxx, am I right? Downgrade your GPU drivers to at least 28x.xx version, it is a nVIDIA bug affecting 7xxx series GPUs.

Read full topic

item.title: Flashlight visibility
item.dc:creator: Rikky007
item.description:
My flashlight has no use in dark places, especially in the ventilation shafts. So I was blind during some parts of the game. Flashlight’s light however shows on some models like handrails or some types of floor…
